lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: When you help a man, or a woman, a family or a community, it benefits the entire world.  We are providing the tools for these borrowers to realize their own dreams through their own visions, capabilities and hard work.  By helping them change their world one dream at a time our world is also changed.  We share their success through the harmony brought by empowerment and that increased harmony affects families, communities and even countries.  My hope is that this activity will help the world will become a kinder and gentler place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for the recording of the financial information of our Company.  This information must be presented so management  will understand the results of past operations and be able to make appropriate future decisions regarding how to utilize the resources of our Company most effectively.  I am also responsible for the collection of amounts due to our Company and for the correct and timely payment of our bills.

She worked with her religious group in high school to spend time in the summer helping in needy areas around us.  She spent time doing missionary work in Ecuador the summer after senior year of high school.  She is an inspiration, showing what one person can do to help!  I hope to continue her good work and ideas in supporting the KIVA program in her name.

Als iedereen in deze wereld, die het een beetje beter heeft dan de allerarmsten, dit op zou pakken.... dan zag de wereld er toch een stuk beter uit.....

I will continue to give to this fund and hope that all that receive use the funds to make life better for the world.  To be able to assist someone in their dream or life sustaining efforts is truly an honor.
lenders.occupational_info: I researched the legal sectors of many different areas of the law as it applied to societal needs.  I also am 12 credits short of my BS in Elementary Education.  I enjoy reading, working with the elderly and children and I want to do something with the third world country before I get too old.  I know I can contribute my energy, love and knowledge to make the world a safer and beautiful place.

lenders.loan_because: I wish to help, to participate in the the lives of others who ask for support and to do something for the welfare of this village Earth.  Thank you for the opportunity.

lenders.occupational_info: I work with families to make their relationships healthier.

lenders.name: Bjørn

lenders.occupational_info: I am an craftsman, repairing old wood-buildings, in an small Norwegian museum.

lenders.name: Ms. Whiffin
lenders.loan_because: We are a grade 4/5 class at Anmore Elementary.  We are learning about the world and how we can make a difference. We have been lending to Kiva now for over a year.  In the first year, we raised over $1100 as a class.  This year, we have already reloaned the money that has come back to us (approximately $775).  My students this year have also embarked on their own fundraising efforts to give them a chance to connect to the project.  Amazingly, they have raised over $1300 so far!!!  The fun part is making the loan!  Each of us chooses a project and researches the region, community and business to determine which project we will support.  The kids are so aware of the world!   They also use statistics to justify their decisions and have become amazing at working with all kinds of numbers.  Hurray for Kiva!

lenders.name: Team PAB
lenders.loan_because: It's an opportunity to contribute goodness to deserving people.
lenders.occupational_info: We help families grow.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: thanks to the support and encouragement of my my friends and family, I have been extremely blessed. I want to support others in realizing their dreams as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books and blogs and stuff.

lenders.name: Radhika
lenders.loan_because: A small good deed is better than a big good intention. I know the anguish of being in need of money; today I have it; I want to share it.
lenders.occupational_info: Working towards living life's true worth. Ever thought how beautiful the world will be if each one of us was truly humane towards just 1 fellow being ?

lenders.loan_because: I have always been facinated by the possiblities of microcredit. For a relatively very tiny amount of capital you can help someone in the developing world to make a difference in their lives. When they repay the loan you can help someone else with the same capital!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers. I focus on lean management techniques and processes data management at one of the top software companies in the world.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Part of venture capital is to provide the necessary funds to start-up enterprises in exchange for a piece of the company in the hope that it does well enough to realize financial gain.  Here is a similar idea in a much more direct and heartfelt way.  Giving a bit of assistance to a growing enterprise, not in search of financial return, but for the betterment of the world as a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in large refineries around the world helping them improve their operations.  Currently, I work in my company's venture capital division, investing in ideas and technology developed in start-up companies that can  help improve operations and help sustain our future.

I work with people facing change - either changing by choice or having change thrust upon them - to:
     • Focus on and define their core values,

     • Provide support for them as they move forward.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a senior in High School in Hollister, California.  I hope to go to college next year and study biology and then I hope to become a doctor one day.

lenders.name: Veena.N.K
lenders.loan_because: I am a Chef, a Food Consultant, Restaurant & a Food Critic.  My motto is to 'Eradicate hunger from the world".  I am willing to do my part.  Whether it is by volunteering, by preparing and serving food and by donating as much as I can.  Something about people going without food touches me a lot.  I don't want to ever hear people suffering ever and not from hunger for sure.  So I want to do my part and I strongly encourage other people to do their part as well.
lenders.occupational_info: My specialty is Global, Asian, Vegetarian and Vegan food.  I help people to change their lifestyles to adapt and to include healthier ways and nutritious food in their daily diet.  I help organizations with menu planning, training employees to get them familiarized with the world of spices, to teach them to cook Asian food and  show them how to combine and use the spices to their advantage.

lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me with enough to share.

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to change their lives.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because:
Microcredit loans empower the poor to lift themselves out of poverty. Through microfinance, they can secure better nutrition, education, healthcare, and housing for their families.

The poor don't lack motivation, drive, or ability. They lack opportunity. There are millions and millions of impoverished people around the world who don't have access to financial services, and the faster we are able to get it to them, the better!
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently studying business and minoring in international development. My hope is to use my major to empower women in developing countries!

lenders.name: Christopher Robins RMT
lenders.loan_because: I was helped to start my business and continue to be helped and inspired by my wonderful clients. It is in appreciation of their support that I show my gratitude to them by "paying it forward" The world is so full of wonderful people and places and Kiva allows us in some small way to reach out to those people and places. If all the hands that reach could touch....Peace.

lenders.loan_because: We have felt the hard times and long work hours building up a company and stabilising it (took almost 10 years starting from 0), thats why we admire people trying to make their own business and are more than happy trying to make their road to success hopefully a little bit easier.
lenders.occupational_info:
Started own company in 1996.
The company has today 6-8 employees performing surface treatment, flooring and termoplastic coating. Our work is today manageing the company with all from getting contracts, safety & quality assurance, ordering products, as well as all the paperwork regarding payments, taxes etc.

lenders.name: Self Advocacy Oxon
lenders.loan_because:
We are a group of citizen advocates. We asked our family and friends to send Kiva gift certificates instead of cards and presents at Christmas. 

We especially want to be connected with parents working to support their families. Every parent we have ever met simply wants their children to have a better childhood than their own childhood ever was. All children are our children! All children deserve this.
> We champion the needs of vulnerable individuals, disadvantaged communities and excluded groups.
> We work to break the cycle of deprivation, to promote informed choices, and to encourage independence and self-efficacy.
> We engage with commissioners, service providers and community stakeholders to develop beneficial outcomes for all citizens regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, age, disability, orientation or any other background.
lenders.occupational_info:
We believe that people will achieve more by working together than they can by working alone. We support the efforts of those who seek success through that co-operative endeavour.

We believe that the only way to create a just and fair society is through power being spread evenly throughout society, and not arbitrarily based on wealth, class, gender or race.

lenders.name: Matt & Lynda
lenders.loan_because:
1 John 3:17-18 
If we have all we need and see one of our own people in need, we must have pity on that person, or else we cannot say we love God. Children, you show love for others by truly helping them, and not merely by talking about it.
